attributes.action: Call for the resignation of the Archbishop of Canterbury
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After the Archbishop of Canterbury’s speech about Sharia law saying the UK has to "face up to the fact that some of its citizens do not relate to the British legal system", we think they should go somewhere else where they can “relate” to the justice system instead of the British people “facing up”.  This man of the church should be trying to uphold our traditions in this country not get rid of them. He is a disgrace and should be sacked.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
